Class AbstractExpenseEarning

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.classes.AbstractExpenseEarning
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IEarningAndExpense
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Earning, Expense

    public abstract class AbstractExpenseEarning
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEarningAndExpense, java.io.Serializable
    Models an idea of Expense and Earning, because they are very similar.
    Author:
    federico marinelli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
